properties.comment: Temporal Sequenced Rewrites Test Cases for SPJ queries
properties.entry: TEMPORAL (SELECT * FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) WHERE A = 1 AND B = 1);
TEMPORAL (SELECT A FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END));
TEMPORAL (SELECT A + 2 AS X, B * 2 AS C FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END));
TEMPORAL (SELECT A FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) WHERE A != B);
TEMPORAL (SELECT A FROM (SELECT * FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) WHERE A = 1) sub WHERE B = 1);
TEMPORAL (SELECT 1 AS boo FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END));

TEMPORAL ( SELECT L.A AS LA, L.B AS LB, R.A AS RA, R.B AS RB FROM (SELECT * FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) WHERE A = 1 AND B = 1) L JOIN (SELECT * FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) WHERE A = 1) R ON (L.B = R.A) );
TEMPORAL ( SELECT L.A AS LA, L.B AS LB, R.A AS RA, R.B AS RB FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) L JOIN TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) R ON (L.B = R.A) );
TEMPORAL ( SELECT count(*) AS x FROM ( SELECT L.A AS LA, L.B AS LB, R.A AS RA, R.B AS RB FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) L JOIN TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) R ON (L.B = R.A) ) );
TEMPORAL (SELECT * FROM TEMP_DATE WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) WHERE A = 1);
